original_title: Circle Jerks: The Show Must Go Off! Circle Jerks Live at the House of Blues
overview: Shot on multiple Panasonic DVX 100 cameras with 24 track digital audio with 5.1 Suround Sound, this episode of "The Show Must Go Off" shows why the Circle Jerks are still as pertinent to the punk scene more than 20 years after the release of their top albums. Over 25 songs are included, commentary, more. .
title: Circle Jerks: The Show Must Go Off! Circle Jerks Live at the House of Blues
